name: bloxy
description: A Node.JS library for interacting with the Roblox website and its API.

scripts.preinstall: echo Hello, I'm glad you are using bloxy as your Roblox module! Please be sure to check out the docs: https://visualizememe.github.io/bloxy
scripts.install: echo Thanks for installing bloxy! Check out the docs: https://visualizememe.github.io/bloxy

author: ScriptBased
